name: Slide On the right Side
description:
This is a game for a game challenge. You can play this Game without your mouse.

Its a endlessrunner game with 2 different levels.  Be careful !!! Its a very tricky game.

you can die at many ways. Select Coins to buy new skins in the shop.

SELF-MADE background music but sound effects from: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/free-casual-game-sfx-pack-5...
